help_entry.name: UncorrelatedRelaxedMolecularClock
help_entry.succinct: Implementation of an uncorrelated relaxed molecular clock model
help_entry.verbose: This function describes a relaxed molecular clock model as implemented in 'Relaxed Phylogenetics and Dating with Confidence', Drummond et al., 2006. The rates are uncorrelated from node to node and are drawn from a common underlying distribution (as specified).

argument.arg_description: An uncorrelated relaxed molecular clock model

help_entry.author: Fredrik Ronquist and Wai Lok Sibon Li
